dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: War is approaching, I fear we will not be able to treat all the wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Yes, there are not enough healers.

dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: And we lack time to train new ones.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: We will have to find a solution, quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: The enemy will besiege the city. Soon they will be at our gates and we will no longer be able to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: I will go out for some fresh air. This may be my last chance to go outside before the enemy arrives.

dialogues.speaker: Mother
dialogues.text: Be careful.

c1_start.text: Tomatola dines with her parents and her little brother.

choices.text: Help her father make medical kits

c1_help_father.text: Tomatola helps her father prepare first aid kits to treat the wounded during the war.

c1_field.text: Tomatola walks in a field. A plume of smoke rises in the distance: peasants burn their crops to prevent the enemy from seizing them.

c1_find_tomato.text: Tomatola finds a special tomato that throbs like a heart.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Do you know what this is?

dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: I had never seen one before but I had heard of it. It is a special variety of tomato, with very powerful medicinal properties.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Do you know how to use it?

dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: No, but my teacher of medicine was an expert in the magical powers of plants. He could teach you how to master the powers of this magical fruit.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Do you know where I can find him?

dialogues.speaker: Father
dialogues.text: He taught at the temple on the mountain, alongside the greatest sages of the kingdom. I am sure he is still there. Leave tomorrow morning, you will have time to reach the temple before the enemy besieges the city!

c1_show_tomato.text: Tomatola shows the magical tomato to her father.

c1_forest_entry.text: Tomatola is ready to set out on an adventure but hesitates between two paths.

c1_path.text: Tomatola meets an old traveler. He gives her a bag to protect the tomato.

dialogues.speaker: Traveler
dialogues.text: Hello, young girl.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Hello, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Traveler
dialogues.text: I recognize the tomato you have with you. It has been years since I last saw one. Long ago, they were common, but most were stolen and sold to the lords of the kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Yes, I imagine they were coveted for their medicinal virtues.

dialogues.speaker: Traveler
dialogues.text: Exactly. They can heal serious wounds. In times of war they are a precious asset for those who possess them. You should hide it to avoid having it stolen. Take this bag and put it inside.

c1_enter_forest.text: In front of her, a majestic she-wolf watches her.

c1_meet_wolf.text: The wolf slowly approaches, feeling safe. Tomatola lets her sniff her hand.

c1_build_trap.text: Tomatola is hungry, she builds a hunting trap to catch dinner.

c1_trap_deer.text: Tomatola and the wolf watch the scene: a trapped deer struggles to escape.

c1_fire.text: Tomatola makes herself a coat while the wolf enjoys a piece of deer meat.

c1_montain.text: The two friends arrive before the mountain: a long road full of obstacles awaits them.

c2_montain_peak.text: The two friends reach the mountain peak.

c2_fight_bear.text: The wolf charges first to protect Tomatola.

c2_wounded_wolf.text: The wolf is wounded: Tomatola bandages her.

c2_carry_wolf.text: Tomatola carries the wolf on her back.

c2_temple.text: The two friends arrive in front of the temple.

c2_temple_safe.text: The two friends arrive in front of the temple.

c2_temple_entry.text: The teacher who saw them arrive comes out to greet them.

c2_temple_entry_2.text: The teacher who saw them arrive comes out to greet them.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: The wound is quite serious, she will need rest. How did this happen?

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: We were climbing the mountain when a bear suddenly appeared and attacked us. The wolf fought back but the beast bit her before I could intervene. I managed to finish the bear by striking a fatal blow to its throat with my knife.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: Impressive. Bears are a serious danger in this region. But tell me, what brings you to my temple?

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: I need your help. While walking in a field, I discovered this magical tomato. I know it has very powerful medicinal powers but I do not have the knowledge to use them.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: Yes, these magical tomatoes are very powerful and very rare. You were very lucky to find this one.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: The city is under siege and my father, who was one of your former students, is convinced that the powers of this tomato can help heal the wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: While the wolf rests, I will teach you the magic formulas necessary to heal wounds. I will also give you a grimoire to train with, as invoking such magical powers requires serious practice.

c2_temple_inside.text: The teacher is examining the wolf.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: Tell me, what brings you to my temple?

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: I need your help. While walking in a field, I discovered this magical tomato. I know it has very powerful medicinal powers but I do not have the knowledge to use them.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: Oui ces tomates magiques sont très puissantes et très rares. Vous avez eu beaucoup de chance de trouve celle-ci.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: The city is under siege and my father, who was one of your former students, is convinced that the powers of this tomato can help heal the wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Teacher
dialogues.text: While the wolf rests, I will teach you the magic formulas necessary to heal wounds. I will also give you a grimoire to train with, as invoking such magical powers requires serious practice.

c2_temple_inside_2.text: The two friends meet the teacher.

c2_bird.text: Tomatola tries to heal a wounded bird by reciting a magic spell dictated by the teacher.

choices.text: Try to save the bird by reciting a magic spell

c2_bird_2.text: Tomatola tries to heal a wounded bird by reciting a magic spell dictated by the teacher.

c2_bird_success.text: The bird takes flight again thanks to Tomatola's magic!

c2_bird_fail.text: Alas, the bird does not survive despite her efforts...

c2_child.text: The teacher shows Tomatola how to heal a child with a high fever.

c2_second_try.text: Tomatola tries again to heal a wounded bird.

c2_child_2.text: The teacher shows Tomatola how to heal a child with a high fever.

c2_goodbye.text: The two friends say goodbye to the teacher and prepare to leave.

choices.text: Heal the adventurer using the powers of the tomato

c3_bow.text: The adventurer thanks Tomatola and offers her a bow.

c3_rabbit.text: The two friends spot a rabbit in the middle of a snowy clearing.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Hello sir.

dialogues.speaker: Peasant
dialogues.text: Hello young girl.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Are you transporting goods to the fortified camp?

dialogues.speaker: Peasant
dialogues.text: Yes, I’ve been on the road since this morning, I’m carrying food for the soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Are you on their side?

dialogues.speaker: Peasant
dialogues.text: No, I am with the resistance. The food is laced with poison that should greatly weaken the enemy. But not a word, or I swear I’ll have your hide.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Do not worry, I am with you. I want to go into the besieged city to help heal the wounded. For that, I must enter the camp discreetly. Could you help me by hiding me in your cart?

dialogues.speaker: Peasant
dialogues.text: Of course, climb in. When I tell you we’re close to the camp, you’ll have to hide and not come out until I say so.

dialogues.speaker: Tomatola
dialogues.text: Understood, thank you very much.

dialogues.speaker: Peasant
dialogues.text: We’re arriving, hide yourself!

choices.text: Set a tent on fire to create a diversion
Try to escape without being caught
